name: HUREL
description:
How to Play

You can control the player with more than three buttons (due to convenience reasons) but you only have four actions to perform.

Move Left: A or Left Arrow 

Move Right: D or Right Arrow 

Jump: Spacebar

Shoot: Mouse Left Click

Credits

•HUREL Studios

•Unity Asset Store

Tools

•Code - Microsoft Visul Studio
